```{r data generation, echo = FALSE, results = "hide"}
sc <- NULL
while(is.null(sc)) {
## parameters
  # prior
  a <- sample(2:10, 1)
  b <- sample(12:20, 1)
  # likelihood
  y <- sample(10:20, 1)
  n <- sample(24:30, 1)
  
  out <- bayesrules::summarize_beta_binomial(
    alpha = a, 
    beta = b, 
    y = y, 
    n = n
    )
  
  ## solution
  res <- round(out[2, 4], 4)

  ## schoice
  sc <- num_to_schoice(res, range = c(0.01, 0.99), delta = 0.05, digits = 4)
}
```
